en.deemedServiceAppStatusMsg: You can continue with your divorce
en.deemedServiceAppStatusMsgDetails1: The court has accepted your application for 'deemed service'. This means it accepts that your {{ divorceWho }} received the application, and you don’t need their response to proceed.
en.deemedServiceAmendedAppStatusMsgDetails1: The court has accepted your application for 'deemed service'. This means it accepts that your {{ divorceWho }} received the amended application, and you don’t need their response to proceed.
en.deemedServiceAppStatusMsgDetails2: This means that you can now continue with your divorce as if they had responded.

cy.deemedServiceAppStatusMsgDetails1: Mae’r llys wedi derbyn eich cais ‘Cyflwyno Tybiedig’. Golyga hyn fod y llys yn derbyn bod eich {{ divorceWho }} wedi cael y cais, ac nid ydych angen eu hymateb i barhau.
cy.deemedServiceAmendedAppStatusMsgDetails1: Mae’r llys wedi derbyn eich cais ‘Cyflwyno Tybiedig’. Golyga hyn fod y llys yn derbyn bod eich {{ divorceWho }} wedi cael y cais diwygiedig, ac nid ydych angen eu hymateb i barhau.
cy.deemedServiceAppStatusMsgDetails2: Golyga hyn y gallwch nawr barhau â’ch ysgariad fel petaent wedi ymateb.
